page.title: 07BOOKIE'S CLERK FROM GRAFFHAM
page.content: I interviewed a clerk who likes his job because he enjoys gambling and likes horses. His favourite jockey is Lester Piggot and his favourite horse is Njinsky. His favourite course is Goodwood because of the scenery. He lives in Selham. When he is at work he writes down all the bets and works out the liability of each horse and the figures, then he calculates what they will win or lose in each race. He thinks that 15 is a good number of horses to have in a race for betting. He begins work at 1.30 p.m. and finishes at 5 o'clock. He travels all around the country and lived in London before he moved here.
